department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: procurement of netting, rope and other equipment
description: Canada is seeking offers from Offerors to provide netting, rope, wire components and repairs for the Campelen 1800 Survey Trawl to Fisheries and Oceans Canada.
duration_in_months: You can consider it as 12 months
full_summary:
### Tender Announcement

**Title:** Netting, Ropes and Wire for Campelen 1800 Survey Trawl
**Publication Date:** August 15, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** September 6, 2023, 2:00 PM Eastern Time

**Reference Number:** WS4051199051
**Solicitation Number:** WS4051199051
**Department:** Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

**Notice Type:** Request for Standing Offer (Demande d’offre à commandes)

**Objective:**
Fisheries and Oceans Canada (DFO) is seeking offers from eligible offerors to provide netting, rope, wire components, and repairs for the Campelen 1800 Survey Trawl.

**Product/Service Description:**

* Rope
* Chain
* Cable
* Wire
* Strap

**Trade Agreements:** Bidders may be eligible for contracts under the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)

**Eligibility:**
Only organizations that are registered in Ariba Network or are exempt from registration are eligible to participate in this tender.

**Contact Information:**
For additional information or to obtain the complete tender package, please visit the Ariba Network website.

**Complaints and Protest:**
Bidders who feel they have been unfairly treated in the tender process may file a complaint or protest with the PWGSC after the tender has closed.

#### Document Details

* Tender Notice Announcement: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17158885?extsite=MTcxNTg4ODVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
* Attachments: None
* Languages: English and French
* Tender Closing Date: September 6, 2023, 2:00 PM Eastern Time
* Public Works and Government Services
